body.title_3: Welcome to rc-seller.com, the first inplementacion of the rc-seller project
body.subheading_3: we are asociated with the developement of the rc-network platform
body.paragraph_1:
We are a social network focused on the research chemical scene. our plateform is modeled and developed upon two opensource projects. As a Plateform we provide an anoniomus exclusive and private chain of trusted relations that allow cooperative, distributed markerplace, based on and collaborative set of tools, catalogues of alias and roles to provide services that integrates the requierements to the participation in an distributed and autogestioned sotial comunity as is rc-seller.es

Donate rc-network!

As services providers that have access to critic and sensitive information, we need the resources to support a reliable hosting infrastructure. The platform need also legal experts to help to fill the information leak in certain aspects: Study of the financial treatment of operations that will be anonymous and catalog of on legal requirements considering the context international trade. Analise and catalog of information concerning laws on production, possession and transport of different items. And this must also be in a comparative manner considering different body regions.

The platform aims to be the rigth place to analize the problems, discurs the altetrnative solutions too the differets problematics,and design , develop and audit the tools and services needed, Finalement we act as a task force who articipate and influence in the responsibles autorities articulating alternatives and proposing them cost nalysys, adecuate normatives, requirements and rules, propose legal mechanisms and finaly provde the tools and solutions that our platform needed to the sucessful develop of our mision

As a platform, we want to provide invitations to others serlf managed groups and actorsable to fill the roles that expand and produce the normlized requierements needed to participate on the network As producers we want to be able to prvide sources of viable and verifiable hitorical information needed for the correct functionnement of the agents and ornaizations that are responsable as harm reduction agens. Another important problem we want to solve is the histyorical lack of estructured acces of this inforemation that, evidently is also neded by the healt autorities

Finaly, it\'s also our role to providing and grant the accessibility to other historical aspects that are also uselful to record and track the long term efects of substances over the popularton. The plateform is also responsible to etablish recolect and grant the validity of the indicators needed for for the auditory of tasks and roles.

Finally,rc-shop.es, as a project of incubation, exposes the issues and dificulties than then can be the discursed in the main place for debating policies, definin roles and fianlly desiging de plataform: the project on sourceforge.
